snippet: Minnesota and Florida State are the other No. 1 seeds at the tournament.
abstract: Southern Methodist will open the National Invitation Tournament at home; snubbed by the NCAA tournament, SMU is a No 1 seed in NIT, along with Minnesota, Florida State and St John’s.
lead_paragraph: Minnesota and Florida State are the other No. 1 seeds at the tournament.

headline.main: Top Seeds S.M.U. and St. John’s Will Open N.I.T. at Home
headline.print_headline: Top Seeds S.M.U. and St. John’s Will Open N.I.T. at Home
